title: Problems purchasing RP and the support doesn't seem to care
body: Rlly I'm waitting one week to buy RP and asked a lot of time for help and they didn't even care about it and putted my ticket as solved.Ridiculous{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: When you say you asked for help, what do you mean?  Do you have a ticket number I could look at?  A ticket that's _Solved_ means that's a response has been sent.  You can still reply to it at anytime, until it's set to _Closed_.    You should still be able to reply to your ticket if you have any concerns!
